{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Supply Chain / Procurement Officer",
  "description": "Tolaram is a fast-moving consumer goods sector, and we&nbsp;are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supply Chain / Procurement Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are looking to hire a proactive and detail-oriented Supply Chain / Procurement Officer to manage and support our procurement, import, and export operations.
	The ideal candidate will have strong supply chain knowledge, hands-on experience with international trade processes, and excellent Excel skills to support planning, reporting, and decision-making.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage end-to-end procurement activities, including sourcing, vendor selection, and purchase order management
	Coordinate import and export processes in compliance with regulatory and customs requirements
	Liaise with suppliers, freight forwarders, and clearing agents to ensure timely delivery of goods
	Monitor inventory levels and support supply planning to avoid stock-outs or excess inventory
	Prepare and analyze procurement and supply chain reports using Microsoft Excel
	Negotiate pricing, terms, and delivery schedules with suppliers
	Ensure accurate documentation for imports, exports, and procurement transactions
	Support cost optimization and efficiency improvement initiatives across the supply chain


Requirements


	MBA or Master&rsquo;s degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, or a related field
	A few years of relevant experience in procurement, imports, and exports
	Strong understanding of international trade, logistics, and supply chain processes
	Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel (reporting, analysis, tracking)
	Experience working with ERP or procurement systems is an added advantage


Salary
N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;deborah.amana@tolaram.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-20",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Tolaram Group"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "192122"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 400000,
      "maxValue": 600000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Supply Chain / Procurement Officer Job at Tolaram Group




        
    

        
        Tolaram is a fast-moving consumer goods sector, and we are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supply Chain / Procurement Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are looking to hire a proactive and detail-oriented Supply Chain / Procurement Officer to manage and support our procurement, import, and export operations.
	The ideal candidate will have strong supply chain knowledge, hands-on experience with international trade processes, and excellent Excel skills to support planning, reporting, and decision-making.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage end-to-end procurement activities, including sourcing, vendor selection, and purchase order management
	Coordinate import and export processes in compliance with regulatory and customs requirements
	Liaise with suppliers, freight forwarders, and clearing agents to ensure timely delivery of goods
	Monitor inventory levels and support supply planning to avoid stock-outs or excess inventory
	Prepare and analyze procurement and supply chain reports using Microsoft Excel
	Negotiate pricing, terms, and delivery schedules with suppliers
	Ensure accurate documentation for imports, exports, and procurement transactions
	Support cost optimization and efficiency improvement initiatives across the supply chain


Requirements


	MBA or Master’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, or a related field
	A few years of relevant experience in procurement, imports, and exports
	Strong understanding of international trade, logistics, and supply chain processes
	Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel (reporting, analysis, tracking)
	Experience working with ERP or procurement systems is an added advantage


Salary
N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: deborah.amana@tolaram.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Tolaram is a fast-moving consumer goods sector, and we&nbsp;are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and diligent Finance Officer to join our finance team.
	The ideal candidate is ICAN-qualified, has strong Excel skills, and possesses sound knowledge of accounting principles to support accurate financial reporting and compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate accounting records and financial documentation
	Prepare journal entries, reconciliations, and financial schedules
	Support monthly and annual financial reporting processes
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and regulatory requirements
	Utilize Microsoft Excel for financial analysis and reporting
	Support audit and tax-related activities as required.


Requirements


	ICAN qualification or in advanced stages of certification
	A few years of relevant accounting or finance experience
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel
	Ability to work diligently with a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.


Salary
N650,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;deborah.amana@tolaram.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Finance Officer Job at Tolaram Group




        
    

        
        Tolaram is a fast-moving consumer goods sector, and we are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and diligent Finance Officer to join our finance team.
	The ideal candidate is ICAN-qualified, has strong Excel skills, and possesses sound knowledge of accounting principles to support accurate financial reporting and compliance.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Maintain accurate accounting records and financial documentation
	Prepare journal entries, reconciliations, and financial schedules
	Support monthly and annual financial reporting processes
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and regulatory requirements
	Utilize Microsoft Excel for financial analysis and reporting
	Support audit and tax-related activities as required.


Requirements


	ICAN qualification or in advanced stages of certification
	A few years of relevant accounting or finance experience
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel
	Ability to work diligently with a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.


Salary

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: deborah.amana@tolaram.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
